In a pic The Hills alum, 31, shared on Instagram, the little boy is dressed in a navy and white striped outfit while under a matching navy and white nautical blanked as he takes a nap. “ Sunday snuggles with this little guy?, ” the proud mom captioned the heartwarming moment.
